settings.content: If your customer is logged-in, the country in his default shipping address will be selected. If you are not sure about the  spelling to use here, refer to the first checkout page.

Do not forget to include the snippet shipping-calculator in your cart.liquid template where you want the shipping  calculator to appear. You can get the snippet here: [shipping-calculator.liquid](https://github.com/carolineschnapp/shipping-calculator/blob/master/shipping-calculator.liquid) .
If you have any questions or concerns, please contact us at [support@fuelmade.com](mailto:support@fuelmade.com)

To function properly, your [shipping options](http://myshopify.com/admin/settings/shipping) as set up in the admin must be formatted such that the SHIPPING SERVICE NAME is formatted like this: 'Service Name (#-# days)', e.g., 'Standard Shipping (1-5 days)'

settings.label: Use customer's default address if logged in instead of geolocating?

settings.info: The form will show up if geolocation fails, geolocation is turned off, or the user wants to manually input a different address

settings.label: Text to display while calculating shipping price
Format of shipping rate.
settings.info: Available variables: [name], [price]. E.g., '[name] - [price]' would result in 'Standard Shipping (3-5 days) - $10.00'

settings.label: Date format for 'Get it by ___________' display
settings.info: [Click here for valid formats](http://momentjs.com/docs/#/parsing/string-format/).  Note: punctuation like commas, periods, hyphens are allowed.

settings.label: Holidays and other days you don't ship
settings.info: One per line in this format: YYYY-MM-DD

settings.label: Message for user if your shop doesn't ship to their location.
settings.default: We do not ship to your location.
settings.info: Available variables: [city], [state code], [state name], [country code], [country name], [postal code]

settings.label: Message if there were no shipping rates found for the user's location / cart items
settings.default: Sorry, either we do not ship to your location or there is not a rate for the items in your cart.
settings.info: E.g., 'Sorry, either we do not ship to your location or there is not a rate for the items in your cart.

settings.label: Message to prompt user to use manual input form when geolocation fails (or they want to manually try a different address)
Message to user indicating the date they must order by to get it in the current time window.
settings.default: Get it by [date] if ordered in the next [cutoff].
settings.info: Available variables: [date], [cutoff].  Date uses the 'Date format for arrive by date' setting above. E.g., 'Get it by [date] if ordered in the next [cutoff]' would become 'Get it by Thursday, Oct. 4th if ordered in the next 3 hours'

settings.label: Results header
settings.info: Available variables: [city], [state code], [state name], [country code], [country name], [postal code], [lowest rate].  E.g., 'Shipping rates for [state name]'

settings.label: Text to ask if the user wants to ship somewhere other than what the geolocation suggests.
settings.info: Available variables: [city], [state code], [state name], [country code], [country name], [postal code]. E.g., 'Not shipping to [city]?'

settings.label: Text to display if shipping is free
Additional message to display with results
settings.default: You will be able to choose your preferred deliver option during the checkout process
